author: International Food Policy Research Institute

organization.description: In collaboration with institutions throughout the world, IFPRI is often involved in the collection of primary data and the compilation and processing of secondary data. The resulting datasets provide a wealth of information at the local (household and community), national, and global levels. IFPRI freely distributes as many of these datasets as possible and encourages their use in research and policy analysis. This group reflects the collection of IFPRI datasets.
organization.title: International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI)
organization.name: ifpri

name: egypt-wheat-miller-survey-1997
notes: The questionnaire was administered at 524 public and private sector wheat flour mills (91 of the 131 public mills, 25 or the 34 contracted private mills, 408 of the 4462 village mills) in 18 governorates from June to September, 1997, and covered the operations of the mills for the year 1996. Topics include the general characteristics of the mills; wheat purchases; flour production and sales; their marketing, transport and communication networks; operating costs; perceived profitability; assets; investment activities; and opinions on the role of government in regulating and setting policy in the wheat milling sector.
title: Egypt Wheat Miller Survey, 1997
